room_title: Escape room "Code Critical" by Last Second Escape in Richmond (VA)
room_description:
One year after the release of Virus X, all hope of government rescue is gone. The last remaining scientists from J.G. Laboratories have passed away and the only humans left are pockets of surviving humans hidden amongst the rubble Richmond in collapse.
At the epicenter of the outbreak is survivor's last hope for a cure. JG Laboratories, one of most well-respected labs on the East Coast is rumored to have been home to the Scientists researching a cure for the disease. Can your team of survivors power up the Laboratory, piece together the work left behind by the missing scientists, and create the antidote before the Lab's emergency power drains?
